title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.150 - Increment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.150 - Increment

State Regulations
(a) An increase in
value from one point of time to another, without reference to cost or book
value. (b) Unearned increment has
reference to an increase in the value of land from causes to which the owner
has made no contribution, as from growth of population. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.150

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
